<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.image.Image?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.StackPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.TilePane?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Text?>
<AnchorPane prefHeight="495.0" prefWidth="760.0" style="-fx-background-radius: 50;" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1"> <children> <StackPane prefHeight="495.0" prefWidth="760.0" style="-fx-background-radius: 50;"> <children> <javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="#2b5237" height="495.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-height: 0; -fx-arc-width: 0;" width="760.0" /> <javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="WHITE" height="419.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-width: 70; -fx-arc-height: 70;" width="678.0" /> </children> </StackPane> <TilePane alignment="CENTER" hgap="10.0" layoutX="43.0" layoutY="37.0" mouseTransparent="true" prefHeight="78.0" prefWidth="678.0"> <children> <javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="#2b5237" height="11.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-height: 30; -fx-arc-width: 10;" width="140.0" /> <javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="#2b5237" height="11.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-height: 30; -fx-arc-width: 10;" width="140.0" /> <javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="#2b5237" height="11.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-height: 30; -fx-arc-width: 10;" width="140.0" /> </children> </TilePane> <Text layoutX="220.0" layoutY="230.0" fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Get Ready!" wrappingWidth="321.765625"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="48.0" /> </font> </Text> <Button layoutX="281.0" layoutY="300.0" mnemonicParsing="false" prefHeight="56.0" prefWidth="199.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 50;" text="START" textFill="#f6b539"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="25.0" /> </font> </Button> </children> </AnchorPane>
